languages.text: {n}Солдат с благоговейным ужасом вытягивается по струнке, образцово задирает перепаханный свежей раной подбородок и гаркает:{/n} "Виноват! Слушаюсь! Звездная гавань находится под контролем стражи губернатора! Командир периметра — сержа..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Солдат, вытянувшись, вскидывает перепаханный свежей раной подбородок и гаркает:{/n} "Виноват! Слушаюсь! Звездногавань находится под контролем сил планетарной обороны! Командир периметра — сержа..."

languages.text: {n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"
languages.original_text: {n}Солдат с благоговейным ужасом вытягивается по струнке, образцово задирает перепаханный свежей раной подбородок и гаркает:{/n} "Виноват! Слушаюсь! Звездная гавань находится под контролем стражи губернатора! Командир периметра — сержа..."

traits.locale_text: {n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's guard! Perimeter command is Sergea—"

{n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's guard! Perimeter command is Sergea—"

{n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"

{n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"

{n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"

{n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"

languages.text: {n}Mit einer Mischung aus Ehrfurcht und Entsetzen, nimmt er Haltung an, hebt das frisch verwundete Kinn wie ein Mustersoldat und bellt:{/n} "Mein Fehler, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Sofort! Der Raumhafen steht unter der Kontrolle der Wächter des Gouverneurs! Der befehlshabende Offizier ist Sergea-"
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer Mischung aus Ehrfurcht und Entsetzen, nimmt er Haltung an, hebt das frisch verwundete Kinn wie ein Mustersoldat und bellt:{/n} "Mein Fehler, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Sofort! Der Raumhafen steht unter der Kontrolle der Wächter des Gouverneurs! Der befehlshabende Offizier ist Sergea-"

languages.text: {n}Avec un air à la fois terrifié et admiratif, il se met au garde à vous, relève son menton ensanglanté à la façon militaire et éructe :{/n} « À vos ordres, Votre Seigneurie ! Tout de suite ! L'astroport est sous le contrôle de la garde du gouverneur ! Commandant du périmètre : serg... »
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un air à la fois terrifié et admiratif, il se met au garde à vous, relève son menton rasé de frais à la façon militaire et éructe :{/n} « À vos ordres, Votre Seigneurie ! Tout de suite ! L'astroport est sous le contrôle de la garde du gouverneur ! Commandant du périmètre : serg... »

languages.text: {n}他猛然立正，脸上带着敬畏和恐惧，像模范士兵一样扬起了刚刚刮过胡子的下巴，高声回答着。{/n}“是我的错，长官！我不会再犯了！星港现在已处于总督卫队的控制下！外围指挥官是军——”
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"

traits.locale_text: {n}他猛然立正，脸上带着敬畏和恐惧，像模范士兵一样扬起了刚刚刮过胡子的下巴，高声回答着。{/n}“是我的错，长官！我不会再犯了！星港现在已处于总督卫队的控制下！外围指挥官是军——”

languages.text: {n}畏怖と恐怖が入り混じった表情で、男はパッと背筋を伸ばし、模範的な兵士さながら剃りたてのあごを上げ、大声で発言した。{/n}「申し訳ございません、陛下！直ちにいたします！スターポートは総督の監視下にあります！防御線を指揮するのは軍曹の…」
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"

traits.locale_text: {n}畏怖と恐怖が入り混じった表情で、男はパッと気を付けの姿勢になり、模範的な兵士さながら剃りたてのあごを上げ、大声で発言した。{/n}「申し訳ございません、陛下！直ちにいたします！スターポートは総督の監視下にあります！防御線を指揮するのは軍曹の—」

languages.text: {n}Con una mezcla de temor y terror, se pone en guardia, levanta la barbilla recién cortada como un soldado ejemplar, y grita,{/n} «¡Error mío, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Ahora mismo! ¡El puerto estelar está bajo el control de los guardias del gobernador! El comandante del perímetro es el Sarge...».
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una mezcla de temor y terror, se pone en guardia, levanta la barbilla recién cortada como un soldado ejemplar, y grita,{/n} «¡Error mío, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Ahora mismo! ¡El puerto estelar está bajo el control de los guardias del gobernador! El comandante del perímetro es el Sarge...».

languages.text: {n}Çavuş, huşu ve dehşet içinde hazır ola geçiyor ve taze tıraşlı çenesini örnek bir asker gibi kaldırıp bağırıyor.{/n} "Benim hatam efendim! Derhâl! Yıldız limanı, valinin dizdarlarının kontrolü altında! Çevre komutanı Çavuş..."
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of awe and terror, he snaps to attention, raises his freshly cut chin like an exemplary soldier, and barks,{/n} "My mistake, {mf|sir|ma'am}! At once! The starport is under the control of the governor's wardens! Perimeter commander is Sergea—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Çavuş, huşu ve dehşet içinde hazır ola geçiyor ve taze tıraşlı çenesini örnek bir asker gibi kaldırıp bağırıyor.{/n} "Benim hatam efendim! Derhâl! Yıldız limanı, valinin dizdarlarının kontrolü altında! Çevre komutanı Çavuş..."
